name: Intercession Sergeant
summary: M6" WS3+ BS3+ A4 W15 Sv3+. Can equip bolt rifle or chainsword. Core ability: And They Shall Know No Fear (ignore modifiers to APL loss).

name: Intercession Gunner
summary: M6" WS3+ BS3+ A3 W14 Sv3+. Equipped with bolt rifle (4/5, Lethal 5+). Tactical equipment: frag or krak grenade (1 per battle).

name: Assault Intercessor
summary: M6" WS3+ BS3+ A4 W14 Sv3+. Armed with chainsword (4/5, Balanced) and heavy bolt pistol.

name: Phobos Marksman
summary: M6" WS3+ BS2+ A3 W13 Sv3+. Equipped with stalker bolt rifle (4/5, MW1), camo cloak (Light Cover when not engaged).
